title: Realist ni Yoru Romanticism
original_name: リアリストによるロマンチシズム
sinopse:
University student Yuki exceeds in nothing but housework. So it's no wonder when he is growing anxious because his job hunt is turning fruitless. One day, his father, a university professor, arranges an interview for him as assistant to the famous public speaker Professor Todaka.

(Source: Girls' Generation Scanlations)
